title: # 425 - Kyle Kinane & ME
description:
Today I talk to comedian and voice of Comedy Central, Kyle Kinane. We talk about moving to Oregon, flash floods, mountain biking, bombing in front of thousands of people, and much more!

You can listen to Kyle’s brand new special “Trampoline in a Ditch” on Spotify, Pandora, and iTunes!

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try free today at http://www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly. 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. get 10% off your first order with code "Bertcast" at http://www.www.fiverr.com   

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
